title: Second Favorite
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Chika-senpai, Chika-senpai, would you go shopping with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Sure~. What are we going to buy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hairpins! We switched hairpins before, right, Chika-senpai? Kasumin thought Kasumin looked cute wearing the clover hairpin back then~, so Kasumin wanted one with a plant motif. And so, Kasumin was hoping you would choose one for me, or something~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh!? You want me to choose!? Sure, sure, let’s go find a cute one~. Ah, then, would you also choose one for me, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Of course~! Kasumin has a good fashion sense, after all! Kasumin will pick the perfect one for you, Chika-senpai! With that said, what motif would you like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm~.... Mikan motif, maybe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Mikan, huh.... Well, Kasumin truly understands the feeling of wanting to wear things you like, so Kasumin will help you! But finding one with a mikan motif might be hard....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Then, why don’t we just make it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Waaah! Great idea, Chika-senpai! Kasumin will make a really cute mikan hairpin for you, so please make one for me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Sounds good~! Let’s go buy the materials then! Time to make our second favorite hairpins~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
